description: The specification of a resource inflow to, or outflow from, a recipe process; and/or a clause, or reciprocal clause, of a recipe exchange.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for the resource.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource.

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of effort.

recipeInputOf.description: Reference to a vf.recipe.recipeProcess this flow is an input of.

recipeOutputOf.description: Reference to a vf.recipe.recipeProcess this flow is an output of.

recipeClauseOf.description: Reference to a vf.recipe.recipeExchange this flow is a primary clause of.

recipeReciprocalClauseOf.description: Reference to a vf.recipe.recipeExchange this flow is a reciprocal clause of.

stage.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.processSpecification for the required resource stage.

state.description: The required state of the desired resource.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the recipe flow.
